headline: Does Ecolab's New CDP Water Index Deepen Its Sustainability Edge for Investors (ECL)?
summary: Global environmental nonprofit CDP and sustainable water solutions company Ecolab recently launched a Water Use Efficiency Index at the World Economic Forum, giving companies a new benchmark to measure and improve operational water performance, initially piloted in the beverage and brewing segment. This initiative highlights how Ecolab is using data-driven tools to embed water stewardship into corporate operations, aligning with growing ESG-focused management priorities. We’ll now explore...
